content.phonenumberdetails.title: Let's verify your mobile number
content.phonenumberdetails.subtitle: By verifying your phone, you will be able to recieve text message alerts from Transport. Don’t worry, you can customize what alerts you will recieve, and rest assured that if we want to text you about something, it is really important.
content.otpdetails.title: Let's verify your mobile number
content.otpdetails.subtitle: A message with a One Time Password was sent to {{phone}}. Enter the OTP below to continue.
content.otpdetails.needtochangenumber: Need to change the number you entered?
content.steps.title: Onboarding with Transport
content.steps.subtitle: As a new applicant looking out for an opportunity to drive with us, there’s a few things we want you to know before starting the Onboarding process

content.drivinglicense.title: Let’s start with your driving license details
content.drivinglicense.subtitle: As an initial requirement we would like you to upload your driving license (front and back) and enter other related details
content.drivinglicense.imageinfo: JPEG or PNG. Max size of 2MB
content.drivinglicense.instruction: Please enter all details <1>exactly</1> as it appears on your driver's license
